This is a problem in the tests-plugin, I fix it right away.

(In reply to comment #1)
> This is a problem in the tests-plugin, I fix it right away.

A stupid question: Is the test plugin just an internal test for proper
CDT functionality or a general support engine for unit tests for general
C++ projects?

> A stupid question: Is the test plugin just an internal test for proper
> CDT functionality or a general support engine for unit tests for general
> C++ projects?

There are several test-plugins and most importantly they contain the JUnit test-suites that are run with the nightly builds. The DOMAST-View is also part of one of those plugins because it is helpful when trying to understand parser bugs.
